thread.title: Young hunk and elderly woman talk about living together | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Young hunk and elderly woman talk about living together | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashley Collman
title: Young hunk and elderly woman talk about living together | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Actor, 31, who kindly took in his dying neighbor, 89, says they haven't worked out what to do if he brings a date home - as he details awkward moment her friend walked in on him in the shower Chris Salvatore, 31, met Norma Cook, 89, four years ago when he moved into an apartment across the hall from her in LA In the past year, Norma's health has declined, and Chris has stepped up to help, moving her into his place On a TV show this week, he said they haven't yet had to figure out what would happen if he wants to bring a date home He also said that they had to rearrange furniture to incorporate hers, since she has a rule limiting furniture to five pieces per room The twosome also revealed that one of Norma's friends recently walked in on Chris in the shower Published: 16:03 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 16:03 GMT, 1 February 2017 97 shares
